sentences.sContent: Sometimes the instruments are read-only, like your speedometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes the instruments are read-only, like your speedometer.
sentences.sCn: 有些仪器是只读的，就像速度计一样；

sentences.sContent: Once the speedometer is placed in a conventional sedan, the system test for the sedan would not road test it at 160 miles/hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once the speedometer is placed in a conventional sedan, the system test for the sedan would not road test it at 160 miles/hour.
sentences.sCn: 但是一旦将速度计安装到家用轿车里面时，对于整部轿车的系统测试将不会在公路上测试160英里/小时这一速度值。

sentences.sContent: A population study from Finland has developed a fascinating scale that can predict 20-year risk for dementia –sort of a brain aging speedometer.
sentences.sContent_eng: A population study from Finland has developed a fascinating scale that can predict 20-year risk for dementia –sort of a brain aging speedometer.
sentences.sCn: 一项芬兰的人口学研究给出了一个引人注目的量表，能够预计20年罹患失忆症的风险，即一种大脑衰老的速度计。

words.tran: 速度，速率；迅速，快速；昌盛，繁荣
快速行动的人或物；调节速度装置
超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆
加快…的速度；使成功，使繁荣

trans.tranOther: an instrument in a vehicle that shows how fast it is going
